item.title: Learning Shell is like a playing game!
item.description: Well, Still there are some things that I should have to keep learning. C Language, and shell are the things. I didn’t start yet about C lang, but The shell. Shell scripts seem very useful more than any other language. # Javascript, Java, etc. They need for only specific environment. On Web, or on a program. But the shell, When you have any of O/S, as there is basically installed shell.
